main event: A round object with blue-white light was observed in Portsmouth, New Hampshire, on 23 March 1966.
interesting points: The object was traveling at a speed of about 300-400 miles per hour., The object was described as being round and changed color to red., Witnesses reported a humming noise associated with the object., The observation lasted for about 2 minutes., The object was estimated to be 2,500 feet above the ground and brighter than the full moon.
witness description: one 13-year-old boy who is a 7th grade student
